statements: SELECT event_name, event_date, weather_condition FROM demand_forecasting WHERE demand_factor > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_name, demand_factor FROM demand_forecasting WHERE weather_condition = 'Sunny' ORDER BY demand_factor DESC;
SELECT event_name, weather_condition, demand_factor FROM demand_forecasting WHERE event_name LIKE '%Concert%' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(demand_factor) AS max_demand_factor FROM demand_forecasting;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecasting WHERE event_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT event_name, demand_factor FROM demand_forecasting WHERE demand_factor > 0.5 ORDER BY demand_factor DESC, event_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, weather_condition FROM demand_forecasting WHERE weather_condition IN ('Sunny', 'Rainy') ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, SUM(demand_factor) AS total_demand FROM demand_forecasting GROUP BY event_name HAVING total_demand > 100 ORDER BY total_demand DESC;
SELECT event_name, AVG(demand_factor) AS avg_demand, COUNT(event_id) AS event_count FROM demand_forecasting GROUP BY event_name HAVING event_count > 1 ORDER BY avg_demand DESC, event_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_category = 'Music';
SELECT event_name, event_category FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_date, event_name FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND precipitation < 5;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_category = 'Music' ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' AND event_category = 'Sports' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_category, event_location FROM events JOIN weather_data ON events.event_date = weather_data.data_date WHERE weather_data.temperature > 30;
SELECT event_name, event_location, weather_condition FROM events LEFT JOIN weather_data ON events.event_date = weather_data.data_date WHERE weather_data.precipitation > 0;
SELECT event_name, event_category, weather_condition FROM events JOIN weather_data ON events.event_date = weather_data.data_date WHERE events.event_location LIKE '%Stadium%';
SELECT * FROM forecast_demand;
SELECT event_date, demand, location FROM forecast_demand WHERE weather_condition = 'Rain';
SELECT factor_name, factor_value FROM external_factors ORDER BY factor_value DESC;
SELECT event_date, event_description FROM historical_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, event_date, demand FROM forecast_demand ORDER BY location ASC, event_date DESC;
SELECT id, event_date, demand, weather_condition, location FROM forecast_demand WHERE location = 'City A' ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_date, demand, location FROM forecast_demand WHERE weather_condition = 'Rainy' ORDER BY event_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, event_date, event_description FROM historical_events ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT factor_name, factor_value FROM external_factors WHERE factor_value > 100 ORDER BY factor_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, event_date, location FROM forecast_demand WHERE demand > 200 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM events WHERE event_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_id = 'abcdefg-123456';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_description FROM events WHERE event_name LIKE '%concert%';
SELECT forecast_date, location, forecast_demand FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_demand > 100 ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_events;
SELECT event_description, event_date FROM historical_events;
SELECT * FROM weather_forecast WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT forecast_date, temperature FROM weather_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT event_description, factor_description FROM historical_events JOIN external_factors ON historical_events.event_id = external_factors.factor_id;
SELECT * FROM historical_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM historical_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_description, event_date FROM historical_events JOIN demand_history ON historical_events.event_id = demand_history.event_id WHERE demand_history.demand_id > 100;

SELECT event_description, temperature FROM historical_events JOIN demand_history ON historical_events.event_id = demand_history.event_id JOIN weather_forecast ON demand_history.weather_forecast_id = weather_forecast.forecast_id WHERE weather_forecast.temperature > 30;
SELECT factor_description, factor_type FROM external_factors WHERE factor_type = 'economic' ORDER BY factor_id ASC;
